dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Welcome to the world of Elyria, a land of magic and wonder.

dialogues.speaker: Player Character
dialogues.text: I'm on a quest to defeat the dark sorcerer Xarath.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: You come across a wise old wizard who offers to aid you in your quest.

dialogues.speaker: Wizard
dialogues.text: We will sneak into Xarath's fortress under the cover of night.
